mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_info ( product_name, district, category_first_id, category_second_id, category_third_id, brand_id, main_image, thumbnail_image, listing_image, detail_images, description, specifications, status, create_pin, create_time, update_pin, update_time, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryFirstId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categorySecondId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryThirdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mainImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnailImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{listingImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailImages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createPin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.select: SELECT pi.id, pi.product_name, pi.district, pi.category_first_id, pi.category_second_id, pi.category_third_id, pi.brand_id, pi.main_image, pi.thumbnail_image, pi.listing_image, pi.detail_images, pi.description, pi.specifications, pi.status, pi.create_pin, pi.create_time, pi.update_pin, pi.update_time, pi.is_delete, pp.original_price, pp.selling_price, pp.bulk_purchase_price, ps.available_quantity, ps.sales FROM product_info pi INNER JOIN product_price pp ON pi.id = pp.product_id INNER JOIN product_stock ps ON pi.id = ps.product_id WHERE pi.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND pi.is_delete = 0 AND pp.is_delete = 0 AND ps.is_delete = 0 AND NOW() BETWEEN pp.effective_time AND IFNULL(pp.expiry_time, NOW())

SELECT pi.id, pi.product_name, pi.district, pi.category_first_id, pi.category_second_id, pi.category_third_id, pi.brand_id, pi.main_image, pi.thumbnail_image, pi.listing_image, pi.detail_images, pi.description, pi.specifications, pi.status, pi.create_pin, pi.create_time, pi.update_pin, pi.update_time, pi.is_delete, pp.original_price, pp.selling_price, pp.bulk_purchase_price, ps.available_quantity, ps.sales FROM product_info pi INNER JOIN product_price pp ON pi.id = pp.product_id INNER JOIN product_stock ps ON pi.id = ps.product_id WHERE pi.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') AND pi.is_delete = 0 AND pp.is_delete = 0 AND ps.is_delete = 0 AND NOW() BETWEEN pp.effective_time AND IFNULL(pp.expiry_time, NOW())
